name: Tree of Life UPC Church
description: A Pentecostal church serving the East Bernstadt, Kentucky community. This religious organization provides spiritual services, worship, and community support through regular church services and religious activities. The church is part of the United Pentecostal Church International (UPCI) denomination and serves as a cornerstone of the local community.
source: Verified from Facebook page, Google search results, and business directories
hours: Closed now (check Facebook for service times)
notes: This is a Pentecostal church, not a substance abuse treatment center. The organization provides religious services and spiritual support to the community. Service times and additional information can be found on their Facebook page.
verification_method: Online research - Facebook page, Google search, business directories
